about_the_game:
Red Recon is an isometric real-time tactical game with stealth elements, placing you in command of a squad of Soviet scouts deployed into East Prussia in the autumn of 1944. Your mission: gather intelligence and carry out precision strikes against enemy forces on the eve of the Red Army’s strategic offensive.

You will face a variety of tasks and circumstances, demanding everything from discreet infiltration of enemy installations to skillful squad management in open battle. Not only must you accomplish your objectives, but you must also survive deep behind enemy lines, working with limited resources, evading constant enemy pursuit, and maintaining contact with your “Center.”

Such a mission can only be entrusted to hardened fighters. Under your command will be a partisan from the Pskov forests, a Baltic Fleet marine, an experienced underground operative from a Smolensk, a taiga hunter-sniper, and many other soldiers. Each of them possesses unique wartime-honed skills and their own motivation for being part of the squad.

Key Features

A next-generation RTT (Real-Time Tactics) experience in which your playstyle determines how you solve missions—operate unnoticed or engage in all-out firefights with the enemy.

  • Utilize stealth tactics like covert infiltration, silent takedowns, disguises as local civilians, and more to gain the upper hand before battle or set up deadly ambushes.

  • Immerse yourself in full-scale real-time tactical combat, where intelligent use of cover, maneuvers, and various weaponry allows you to defeat even a numerically superior foe.

  • Activate the tactical pause to synchronize actions among multiple squad members, enabling the stealthy elimination of enemy groups or gaining control over chaotic battle situations.

  • Experience dramatic and gripping events of the final phase of the Great Patriotic War—undertake reconnaissance and sabotage operations in East Prussia in autumn 1944, right before the Red Army’s decisive strike into the heart of the Reich.

  • Survive behind enemy lines amidst constant pursuit, lack of local support, scarce resources, and the relentless approach of winter.

Story

Step into the role of Captain Mironov, commander of a special operations group undergoing combat training at a camp near Smolensk. Parachute into East Prussia, reach the rendezvous point, establish contact with “Center,” and commence your first mission: reconnoiter the fortified area “Ilmenhorst.”

Make contact with other Soviet reconnaissance teams operating in East Prussia. Support the Red Army’s advance with pinpoint strikes and sabotage deep in enemy territory. Evade the special squad formed to hunt down saboteurs, and secure the secret intelligence that must be delivered back to the “Mainland” at any cost.
